html:
** EV firm's shares RIVN.O down 1% at $113.9

** RIVN, which is backed by Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O and Ford Motor Co F.N, is set to report later in the day its first results since going public in November

** Analysts expect a loss of $5.52/share - Refinitiv data

** "We forecast extremely strong top-line growth in excess of that which Tesla was able to achieve early on, RIVN shares trade at a material discount to Tesla, at a potentially unwarranted discount to Lucid" - JP Morgan

** Stock rose 130% to a record high of $179.46 in a rally following IPO on Nov. 10

** "While the consumer and commercial segments serve two distinct customer segments, the business units collaborate to leverage technology across both units and gain scale advantages" - Baird

** Eight of 13 brokerages rate the stock "buy" or higher, 5 "hold"; their median PT is $130

** Up to Wednesday's close, stock had risen ~47% over issue price


(Reporting by Akash Sriram in Bengaluru)

(( Akash.Sriram@thomsonreuters.com ;))
